name: bj-cbv3hv2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

comment: Version of ~ cbv3h with two disjoint variable conditions, which does not require ~ ax-11 nor ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
